content:
Service Cloud

Service contracts in Salesforce represent a customer support agreement between you and your customers. They can be used to represent subscriptions, service level agreements (SLAs), and other types of customer support.

Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with the Service Cloud

Set Up Service Contracts
Service contracts are agreements between you and your customers for a type of customer support.
Add Contract Line Items to Service Contracts
Contract line items can be used to specify which products a service contract covers.
Work with Service Contracts
Service contracts help track customer support agreements. Learn how to create and manage them.

Available editions:
Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
title: Service Contracts and Entitlement Management in Service Cloud
